ygData.subject: Re: patchwork, studded and reinforced leather armour question
ygData.msgSnippet: do u know where i can find a big sewing kit ? i m currently around the freeport region. thanks! roy ... From: Davis Tuea  To:
ygData.messageBody:
do u know where i can find a big sewing kit ?
i'm currently around the freeport region.

thanks!
roy

----- Original Message -----
From: Davis Tuea <dtfp@...>
To: <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, June 22, 1999 7:55 PM
Subject: Re: [sg-everquest] patchwork, studded and reinforced leather armour
question


> From: "Davis Tuea" <dtfp@...>
>
> You have to buy a BIG sewing kits to do the other two kind of leather
armor
>
>
> Eriz
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Yap Sieh Roy <sryap@...>
> To: <sg-everquest@onelist.com>

> Subject: [sg-everquest] patchwork, studded and reinforced leather armour
> question
>
>
> > From: "Yap Sieh Roy" <sryap@...>
> >
> > hi,
> >
> > been trying to practise my tailoring skillz.. i got a couple of
questions
> > abt making armour, hope u guys can help.
> >
> > ruined pelt + pattern = patchwork armour
> > medium pelt + studs + pattern = studded armour
> > hi-quality pelt + file + pattern = reinforced armour
> >
> > the above is as far as i understand from the tailoring book. there is
only
> 2
> > slots in the sewing kit so.patchwork is no problem but what about
studded
> > and reinforced where 3 items are required? what is the sequence of
making
> > them ?
> >
> > thanks !
> > roy
